name: CLAWRUNNER
description:
CURRENTLY IN BETA --> There will be bugs, so I THANK YOU for playing all the way through.  And please fill out the survey after  :)

https://forms.gle/e9Q3hbmKhduPmWh36

YOU ARE A CLAWRUNNER. A dino detective. Specializing in taking down the Raplicants, cyborg dinos that look exactly like us.

WASD to move.

Find Clues on the ground that lead you to the Raplicant.

Detective to win.

The Raplicant looks like everyone else. And the Raplicant is still out to kill.

You should stop them before they kill everyone...
